column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I have a very specific way that I approach it and I do the same thing each week .
#text=On Tuesdays , the grocery ads come out for the week .
#text=I look through them and make a list of what is on sale .
#text=Once I have a list of what I will be cooking , I write those ingredients down along with all of the other things I want or need .
#text=I put all of the dairy items together , then the meat items , followed by the produce , and so on .
#text=This makes it more efficient when I am pushing a cart through the store .
#text=Once I 'm at the store , I select my items quickly .
#text=I usually buy the same brands and often the same items each week , so I know where everything is .
#text=When I 'm ready , I go to the checkout and put it all on the belt so I can pay for it .
#text=I love grocery shopping but I hate to put it all away when I get home !
